alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Jackson and northern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 345 PM CDT... At 311 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Blountstown, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Altha, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Red Oak, Selman, Chason, Union City, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Sink Creek, Center Lake, Willis, Alliance, Blountstown Airport, Macedonia and White Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
